strategy: Rush null-magic mantle in this matchup and she will never one-shot you with her combo. Use your W when she Qs you to mitigate some damage during the trade. She will look to harass you with her long range AAs. Look to all-in her as soon as she uses her stun passive. Focus on farming safely and avoid trading when Annie's stun is up.
tips: Annie's bear, Tibbers, burns enemies around him. Keep your distance when summoned.
Trade after Annie uses her stun or misses her abilities.
Utilize Doran's Shield for sustain against Annie's poke.
